verses.content: “LALPA inah fêng ei tiu,” Ka kuoma an ti lai khan ka lâwm a.
Aw Jerusalem, i kul kawtkhâr sûngah, Kan kehai chu a ngîr ta hi.
Jerusalem, khawpui indin thar, Detindo taka rem chu.
LALPA hming inpâk dingin, Chutaka chun hnamhai chu an hang fe hlak, LALPA hnamhai chu, Israelhai kuoma thuinhriettirna dingin.
Chutaka chun rorêlna dingin ṭhungphahai daw a ni sih a, David sûnghai lalṭhungphahai chu.
Jerusalem thlamuongna ding hnipêk ro, Nangma ngainatuhai chu thawveng an tih.
I kul sûnga chun thlamuongna um sienla, I lal inhaia chun thawvengna um raw se.
Ka unauhai le ka ruolhai leiin, “I sûngah thlamuongna um raw se,” tîng ka tih.
LALPA ei Pathien in lei chun, I ṭhatna ding zawng ka tih.
